snippet: The president offers a strong case for his policies, and puts Mitt Romney on the defensive.
abstract: Editorial applauds Pres Obama's performance in second presidential debate; holds Obama regained full command of his vision and his legacy, leaving Mitt Romney sputtering with half-answers, deceptions and a memorable error on issue of attack on American consulate in Libya.
lead_paragraph: The president offers a strong case for his policies, and puts Mitt Romney on the defensive.

headline.seo: Mr. Obama Comes Back in Debate No. 2
